channel.title: Punkbuster -.-
channel.description:
ITS SOOOO ANNOYING...
Everytime if i use cheats then the cheat is detected by punkbuster ... What do you think about those anti-hack progams on games -.-

item.title: Punkbuster -.-
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:3, topic:129845”].Flair, how many games are so badly coded you can take out their protection software…?
Dave, what you do is you work around it, or disable it when it tries to run using an injector.[/quote]

Not very many, good point.

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:4, topic:129845”][quote author=.Flair link=topic=180466.msg1649340#msg1649340 date=1186151884]
I think you should edit the code and take them out.
[/quote]

You think their that stupid? PunkBuster checks for modified files. It’s more of a server side thing, you can’t do shit.[/quote]
Some game creators are.

Read full topic

item.title: Punkbuster -.-
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

.Flair:

I think you should edit the code and take them out.

You think their that stupid? PunkBuster checks for modified files. It’s more of a server side thing, you can’t do shit.

[quote=“Dave007, post:1, topic:129845”]ITS SOOOO ANNOYING…

Everytime if i use cheats then the cheat is detected by punkbuster …
What do you think about those anti-hack progams on games -.-[/quote]

You do realize, without punkbuster, the only thing that will be on your mind in the game is how fast you can enable your aimbot? I’ve seen games go down the drain because of cheaters and been successfully revived thanks to anti cheat programs.

Read full topic
